data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Sejong, South Korea will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sejong, South Korea
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: the state of Sejong has (about) 45,089 people who know Jesus, 37,871 people who know about him culturally, and 192,640 people who are far from Jesus.

data.section_summary: On average, 15 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Sejong, South Korea.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Sejong to agree with you and with one another.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Sejong, South Korea.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, encourage the 45,089 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Sejong, South Korea.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Sejong.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

location.name: Sejong
location.people_groups_list: Burmese, Chinese, general, Deaf, Vietnamese, Kazakh
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Burmese (23,000), Chinese, general (1,039,000), Deaf (103,000), Vietnamese (151,000), Kazakh (12,000)
